SELECT cs.idx as idx, mb.name as authorid, cd.value as categoryid, cs.title as title, cs.contents as contents, cs.imageurl as imageurl, cs.recommendation as recommendation, cs.postdate as postdate, cs.modifydate as modifydate
FROM jtb_cookingshow_main cs, JTB_CODE cd, JTB_MEMBER mb where cs.categoryid = cd.code and cd.CATEGORY='diet_division' and cs.authorid = mb.id order by recommendation desc
